name: Radishock
description:
Your name is Rads. Your location is unknown. Your mission to find the cure.  This game is my first attempt to create something in the Metroidvania genre which is one of my favorites.  My goal for this #lowrezjam was to create one relatively big and a bit nonlinear level with three abilities and a few enemies – this goal was achieved! 

How to play MovementJumpSlideShootBlastMenuZoom InZoom OutKeyboardA/DWSEQEscape90Joystick (XBox)Left StickABXYStart
